title: Unable to login system
description: The customer reports that they are unable to login into the system after multiple attempts. Error messages appear intermittently and need urgent resolution.

title: Payment not processing checkout
description: When trying to complete the purchase, the payment fails and no confirmation is sent. Customer tried multiple payment methods without success.

title: Buttons overlapping small screens
description: UI buttons overlap on devices with small screen resolution, making it difficult to navigate. Needs responsive adjustments.

title: Dashboard loading very slow
description: Dashboard takes an excessive amount of time to load, affecting productivity. Performance optimization required.

title: Forgot password email missing
description: Customers are not receiving password reset emails. Tested multiple accounts and email domains, issue persists.

title: Server error submitting forms
description: Submitting forms on the platform results in server error 500. Logs need to be checked for root cause.

title: Request for dark mode
description: Customer requested dark mode support for better usability during night time. Feature enhancement needed.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for updates or alerts. Investigate mail server and delivery logs.

title: App crashing on Android
description: Mobile application crashes immediately on Android version 14. Users cannot use the app. Crash logs available for analysis.

title: Unable to download reports
description: PDF reports cannot be downloaded from the reporting section. Multiple users affected. Urgent fix required.
